price: Međutim, ko obavezu svoju ispunjava i grijeha se kloni, pa Allah, doista, voli bogobojazne.
arabic: بَلَىٰۚ مَنۡ أَوۡفَىٰ بِعَهۡدِهِۦ وَٱتَّقَىٰ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُحِبُّ ٱلۡمُتَّقِينَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: balā man awfā biʿahdihi wa-ittaqā fa-inna al-laha yuḥibbu al-mutaqīna
